text.content:
Cracked Knee

Crit Effect: Until healed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and takes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -5-foot status penalty to your land Speed]{-5-foot status penalty to land Speed}.

Bludgeoning

Calf Jab

Crit Effect: Until healed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} and takes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -10-foot status penalty to your land Speed]{-10-foot status penalty to your land Speed}.

Piercing

Ugly Wound

The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to checks with all Charisma-based skills except Intimidation.

Slashing

Now you see me...

You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Invisible]{Invisible} until the end of your next turn or until you use a hostile action.

Bomb or Spell
